name: Taramosalata
description: This dip gets its pink hue from carp roe, though cod can also be used. The briny little balls are mixed with breadcrumbs, lemon juice, and olive oil. The result is a creamy, salty spread that's incredibly addictive.
recipeIngredient: 8 slices firm white bread (preferably at least a few days old)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine bread and water. Let bread soak for one minute then squeeze out all moisture and set aside.
Add tarama and 3 tablespoons lemon juice to the bowl of a food processor. Pulse until combined. Add the bread and remaining lemon juice and pulse until combined.
With motor running, add oil and blend until mixture is light and fluffy.
